document_data.name: Oogie Wisham
document_data.mainbody:
'''Oogie Wisham''' was a rather peculiar and paranoid individual who lived in [[Beregost]] during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|"''Recent evidence suggest that a barrel full of [[monkey]]s is not half as much fun as previously claimed, and is, in fact, rather horrifying!''"|Oogie, to a stranger}}
document_data.Personality: Oogie had a particularly strong fear of [[paladin]]s, especially those that were exceptionally judgmental.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Oogie encountered the paladin [[Bjornin]] at the [[Jovial Juggler]] and became incredibly uncomfortable, hiding out in the inn's upper floor.
